about_the_game:
In the summer of 2007, a group of friends take a trip off the grid and away from the eyes of social media into the lush wilderness of the Adirondacks. At a secluded lake house during their final break before college, they hope to strengthen old friendships, form new romances, or just have a fun summer fling. However, three of them will find something different, and more memorable than they were bargaining for.

Follow three unique protagonists as they experience love, sex, change, and growth. Complex Relations is an 18+ visual novel presented in three perspectives, in which the player can not only guide the central relationship to different outcomes, but explore it from the viewpoints of all the main characters.




  • Multiple viewpoint characters. Switch between the perspectives of three different and fully-realized protagonists.
  • Three main endings, with multiple variations on each.
  • Extensive player choices, including choices during explicit scenes! Choices make a difference throughout the game, not just for dividing routes.
  • Fully original soundtrack.
  • CGs featuring the lush natural beauty of the Adirondack national park area.
  • Also sex.
  • Colorful and polished sprite dynamics.




Producer: Shirogane Ryouko
Writing and Sprite Coordination: Desertopa
Sprite and CG Art: Hoshiineko
Background Art: Ms.Catmermaid
GUI: Khoaisama
Soundtrack: Izakaya Funes
Special thanks: EsoDev

content_descriptors.notes: Complex Relations contains scenes featuring nudity, consumption of alcohol, innuendo and sexual reference, and depictions of sexual interactions between characters. All characters appearing in the game are over 18 years of age, and all sexual scenes are fully consensual. Graphic depictions are not censored with mosaic.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card

name: Complex Relations Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Complex Relations is an erotic romance visual novel in three perspectives, exploring three unique protagonists' experience of love, sex, change and growth.
